body.p: The font-variant-alternates CSS property controls the use of alternate glyphs, rather than the default ones.Currently, supports only the styleset() function for font-variant-alternates.

section.title: Style Sets
section.p: The styleset() function defines a stylistic alternative for sets of characters. The parameter is a font-specific name mapped to a number. It corresponds to the OpenType value ssXY (e.g. ss02).
